input: Anne is not round. Charlie is big. Charlie is blue. Dave is blue. Dave is not nice. Gary is nice. Gary is red. All nice, blue people are red. Blue, white people are big. Red people are round. All nice, white people are blue. Red, round people are white. If Dave is round then Dave is white. If someone is white and not round then they are quiet. Big, red people are not quiet. Question: Gary is not quiet.?
output:
universe u

constant obj : Type u

constant Anne : obj
constant Charlie : obj
constant Dave : obj
constant Gary : obj

constant Round : obj → Prop
constant Big : obj → Prop
constant Blue : obj → Prop
constant Nice : obj → Prop
constant Red : obj → Prop
constant White : obj → Prop
constant Quiet : obj → Prop

axiom T1 : ¬ Round Anne
axiom T2 : Big Charlie
axiom T3 : Blue Charlie
axiom T4 : Blue Dave
axiom T5 : ¬ Nice Dave
axiom T6 : Nice Gary
axiom T7 : Red Gary

axiom R1 : ∀ x : obj, Nice x ∧ Blue x → Red x
axiom R2 : ∀ x : obj, Blue x ∧ White x → Big x
axiom R3 : ∀ x : obj, Red x → Round x
axiom R4 : ∀ x : obj, Nice x ∧ White x → Blue x
axiom R5 : ∀ x : obj, Red x ∧ Round x → White x
axiom R6 : ∀ x : obj, White x ∧ ¬ Round x → Quiet x
axiom R7 : ∀ x : obj, Big x ∧ Red x → ¬ Quiet x
axiom R8 : Dave → White Dave

theorem gary_is_not_quiet : ¬ Quiet Gary :=
begin
  apply R7,
  split,
  apply R2,
  split,
  apply R4,
  split,
  exact T6,
  apply R5,
  split,
  exact T7,
  apply R3,
  exact T7,
  exact T7,
end

-- The answer is True
